00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                                MtkDdToDms                                 =
00004 =                                                                           =

00017 #include "MisrUnitConv.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <math.h>
00020 
00033 MTKt_status MtkDdToDms(
00034   double dd,  
00035   double *dms  )
00036 {
00037   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00038   int sgn;          /* Sign of input */
00039   int deg;          /* Degrees */
00040   int min;          /* Minutes */
00041   double sec;           /* Seconds */
00042   double ang;           /* Absolute value dms angle */
00043 
00044   if (dms == NULL)
00045     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00046 
00047   /* determine sign */
00048 
00049   if (dd < 0.0) {
00050     sgn = -1;
00051   } else {
00052     sgn = 1;
00053   }
00054   ang = fabs(dd);
00055 
00056   /* find degrees */
00057 
00058   deg = (int)ang;
00059   if (deg > 360) return MTK_OUTBOUNDS;
00060 
00061   /* find minutes */
00062 
00063   ang = (ang - deg) * 60.0;
00064   min = (int)ang;
00065   if (min > 60) return MTK_OUTBOUNDS;
00066 
00067   /* find seconds */
00068 
00069   sec = (ang - min) * 60.0;
00070    
00071   if (sec > 60.0) return MTK_OUTBOUNDS;
00072 
00073   /* pack sign, degrees, minutes, seconds into dms */
00074 
00075   *dms = sgn * (deg * 1000000 + min * 1000 + sec);
00076 
00077   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00078 
00079 ERROR_HANDLE:
00080   return status_code;
00081 }
